Title: Scaffold Vite React TS app (pnpm)
Description: Initialize Vite+React+TypeScript project with pnpm scripts; add minimal routing and pages: Repo Input, Plan, Chapter
Acceptance: `pnpm dev` renders pages and navigation works; `pnpm build` succeeds
Test_Method: manual: pnpm install; pnpm dev; pnpm build
Notes: Keep structure Vercel-friendly; Manual checklist: pnpm dev (verify nav Repo↔Plan, open Chapter 1), pnpm build

Title: Add Gemini proxy API (/api/llm)
Description: Implement Vercel Serverless Function calling Gemini using env `GEMINI_API_KEY`; define request/response contract, timeouts, safe errors
Acceptance: Frontend never sees API key; `/api/llm` responds with expected JSON and handles error cases with stable codes
Test_Method: manual: set env; call endpoint locally or on Vercel preview; verify error paths
Notes: No server-side persistence of user data; Manual checklist: set GEMINI_API_KEY (+ optional GEMINI_MODEL, GEMINI_API_VERSION=v1beta); POST /api/llm with JSON body containing prompt=hi returns ok:true and outputText; invalid JSON -> 400 BAD_REQUEST; missing GEMINI_API_KEY -> 500 CONFIG_MISSING; non-POST -> 405 METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED

Title: Define domain models + Zod schemas
Description: Create types and Zod schemas for Session, RepoSource, ChapterPlan, Chapter, Task, Message, QuizAttempt; include versioning
Acceptance: Schemas validate LLM outputs; schema errors are detectable and actionable
Notes: Prefer strict schema; allow safe degradation

Title: Implement local persistence (IndexedDB)
Description: Add storage layer for sessions, progress, Q&A history, quiz attempts; support basic migration/versioning
Acceptance: Reload restores last session; storage handles schema version change without crashing
Test_Method: pnpm test (Vitest) + manual: complete a chapter then refresh and confirm restore

Title: Public GitHub repo ingestion (lightweight)
Description: Parse GitHub URL; fetch default branch and select limited files (README, docs, configs, entrypoints); enforce caps for files/bytes/depth
Acceptance: Given a public repo URL, app builds a context bundle within caps; clear UX for not found, rate limit, oversized repos
Test_Method: pnpm test (Vitest, mocked fetch) + manual: try 2 public repos
Notes: Treat repo text as untrusted input; never execute fetched code; Manual: try 2 public repos in UI still pending

Title: Prompt orchestration: plan, chapter, Q&A, quiz
Description: Implement prompt builders and orchestrators; enforce structured outputs (JSON) for plan/chapter/quiz; include retry and safe fallback
Acceptance: Plan + Chapter 1 generated reliably; Q&A grounds answers in provided context bundle; invalid JSON triggers retry/degrade
Notes: Add prompt-injection guardrails; keep prompts versioned

Title: UI learning flow end-to-end
Description: Wire UI: repo input → plan view → chapter view; task checklist; mark complete; CTA continue vs quiz; show saved history
Acceptance: User completes a chapter and sees persisted state; loading/error UX is clear; flow matches Acceptance Checklist in plan
Test_Method: pnpm e2e (Playwright) or manual checklist if E2E blocked
Notes: If Playwright blocked, document manual steps and flag risk

Title: Deep open-ended quiz + grading + review
Description: Generate 3–5 deep Q&A questions after chapter; collect user answers; grade with rubric and provide feedback; store attempts and allow review
Acceptance: Quiz can be started after chapter completion; grading/feedback shown; attempt persists and is reviewable after reload
Test_Method: pnpm test (Vitest) + manual: complete a quiz then reload and review attempt
Notes: Keep rubric stable to make attempts comparable

Title: Safety limits + error hardening
Description: Add input/output size caps, request cancellation, stable error mapping, and UX messaging; ensure server does not store prompts by default
Acceptance: Oversized repos or long inputs fail safely with guidance; LLM/network failures surface actionable messages
Test_Method: manual: attempt oversized inputs; force API errors; verify no crashes

Title: Docs for local run + Vercel deploy
Description: Write README with setup, env vars, deploy steps, privacy stance, limitations, troubleshooting
Acceptance: A new user can deploy on Vercel and run MVP end-to-end following README
Test_Method: manual: follow README steps on a clean environment
Notes: Do not include secrets; include limitation notes

Title: Regression pass (MVP)
Description: Run declared tests and smoke flows; fix critical issues; finalize MVP checklist
Acceptance: `pnpm test` passes; `pnpm build` passes; E2E or manual checklist passes; checklist items satisfied
Test_Method: manual: pnpm test; pnpm build; pnpm e2e (or manual checklist)
Notes: Only mark Review/Regression DONE after actually running the Test_Methods
